definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: My husband and I bought a house by divided payment, around which was filled with hibiscuses.
sentences.chinese: 買了一套房子，小區裏種滿了木槿。

sentences.english: Tie the hibiscus tea bag under the faucet and the running hot water you are filling your bath with.
sentences.chinese: 把木槿花茶袋系在水龍頭下，把熱水放滿你的浴缸。

sentences.english: Can hibiscus tea lower blood pressure?
sentences.chinese: 木槿花茶能降低血壓嗎？

sentences.english: I would open my eyes and he'd be there, hibiscus-laden, laughing.
sentences.chinese: 我睜開眼睛，他就會在那裏，在那木槿花叢中大笑。

sentences.english: Just take ten or so flowers and soak them in hot water.
sentences.chinese: 取十幾朵木槿花放進開水中。

sentences.english: Hibiscus flowers are a familiar flower to be found in tropical regions including the Hawaiian Islands.
sentences.chinese: 木槿花是一種熱帶地區包括夏威夷島上常見的花卉。

sentences.english: And so what does the Hibiscus Flower Kingdom wish to conclude this essay with?
sentences.chinese: 而木槿花王國想以什麼來結束這篇短文？

sentences.english: The dye is marketed as "aniline purple" or "mauveine. "
sentences.chinese: 其市場名爲“苯胺紫”或“木槿紫”。

sentences.english: There is one popular plant that I have not tried it, i. e, hibiscus .
sentences.chinese: 有一種很受歡迎的植物我沒種過，就是木槿。

definition: Chinese peony (Paeonia lactiflora)/common herbaceous peony/peony used in TCM
common mallow (Malva sinesis), used in TCM
